about_the_game:
In Gyroban, the classic Sokoban puzzle formula gets a twist—literally! Instead of pushing boxes, you must rotate and shake entire levels to place colored players into their correct spots.

As you progress, you'll encounter a variety of special objects and obstacles that add layers of complexity to the gameplay. Teleporters, switches, color changers, ice floors, destructible walls, lasers, bombs, fans, magnets, movement limits, objects that prevent undo actions, and more will force you to think creatively.

The game features 91 handcrafted levels, all linked within a large, interconnected overworld. As you solve required puzzles, you unlock new areas and discover secret zones hiding even more challenges.

Features:

  • Develop a unique mindset to solve rotating and shaking puzzles.

  • Progressive difficulty with new mechanics introduced throughout the game.

  • Explore a large, maze-like overworld filled with secret areas and optional puzzles.

  • Control 3 distinct types of colored players, each with its own movement style.

  • 91 handcrafted levels with diverse environments, from classic Sokoban puzzles to intricate mazes.

  • 15+ dynamic mechanics, including teleporters, ice floors, switches, lasers, fans, bombs, and more.

  • Infinite undo feature to encourage experimentation without frustration.

  • Track your number of moves for each level and total playtime.

  • Fully customizable keyboard controls for a personalized experience.

In Gyroban, the classic Sokoban puzzle formula gets a twist—literally! Instead of pushing boxes, you must rotate and shake entire levels to place colored players into their correct spots.

As you progress, you'll encounter a variety of special objects and obstacles that add layers of complexity to the gameplay. Teleporters, switches, color changers, ice floors, destructible walls, lasers, bombs, fans, magnets, movement limits, objects that prevent undo actions, and more will force you to think creatively.

The game features 91 handcrafted levels, all linked within a large, interconnected overworld. As you solve required puzzles, you unlock new areas and discover secret zones hiding even more challenges.

  • Explore a large, maze-like overworld filled with secret areas and optional puzzles.

name: Gyroban

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Spin and shake entire Sokoban-like levels to solve puzzles, avoid obstacles, and interact with unique objects that transform gameplay and add new layers of challenge.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
